IV.i.2.E.4.b
.
Ancillary Conditions of Pregnancy
Some ancillary conditions common to pregnancy are
anemia
back pain
edema in the legs
gestational diabetes
hypertension
shortness of breath, and
urinary tract infections.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Examinations in Special Situations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
